title: Lieff Cabraser Profiled by Law360 as a Cybersecurity & Privacy Law "Practice Group of the Year" for 2024
text:
Law360 (subscription) has published an in-depth profile on Lieff Cabraser’s Privacy & Cybersecurity Law practice group as part of its recognition of the firm as a 2024 “Cybersecurity & Privacy Law Practice Group of the Year.” The feature highlights the firm’s leadership in groundbreaking internet privacy and data security litigation, including major settlements with some of the world’s largest tech companies.
In one case, Lieff Cabraser secured a $115 million settlement with Oracle, addressing allegations that the company unlawfully collected and sold detailed electronic profiles of internet users without consent. The settlement, which required Oracle to overhaul its data collection practices, set a critical precedent by confirming that the unauthorized collection of personal data can carry significant liability.
In another key victory, the firm helped negotiate a $62 million settlement with Google over claims that the tech giant illegally tracked and stored smartphone users’ private location information, even after users disabled the “location history” feature. The deal also required Google to implement significant privacy reforms, including policies to automatically delete location information after 18 months.
“These settlements are important because they both act as a deterrent and stand as statements that this kind of conduct is actionable,” noted Michael W. Sobol, partner and chair of Lieff Cabraser’s Cybersecurity & Privacy practice group. “We have to get a handle on what’s going on with our data, and private citizens and private attorneys have an important role to play in that.”
Read the full profile on Law360’s website (subscription).
About Lieff Cabraser
Described by The American Lawyer as “one of the nation’s premier plaintiffs’ firms,” Lieff Cabraser enjoys a national reputation for professional integrity and the successful prosecution of our clients’ claims. We possess sophisticated legal skills and the financial resources necessary for the handling of large, complex cases, and for litigating against some of the nation’s largest corporations.
In 2024 alone, Lawdragon recognized 9 Lieff Cabraser lawyers as “Lawdragon 500 Leading Lawyers,” 24 Lieff Cabraser lawyers as “Leading Plaintiff Financial Lawyers,” 28 firm lawyers as “Leading Plaintiff Consumer Lawyers,” 14 firm lawyers as “Global Plaintiff Lawyers,” and 10 firm lawyers as “Leading Plaintiff Employment & Civil Rights Lawyers.” We saw 13 lawyers named to Lawdragon’s 2024 “Lawdragon 500X, The Next Generation” list, and The National Law Journal honored us with their 2024 “Elite Trial Lawyers” awards for Employee Rights and Anti-Discrimination. Our firm was named “Class Action Department of the Year” by the New York Law Journal, and our firm’s JUUL injuries case team shared the Daily Journal’s 2024 “California Lawyer of the Year” award. We saw two lawyers named as the Journal’s “Leading Commercial Litigators” for 2024, and Law360 named LCHB its “Product Liability Law Practice Group of the Year.”
